td.content: s:54 yo male technical writer presents with 17 months history of critical seeing flashes of light in right visual field. o:Height 180 cm, Weight 64 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14 a:Migraine Headaches p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

tr.td: University Ears Nose and Throat Specialists

td.content: s:patient presents with 3 years history of critical seeing flashes of light in right visual field, critical nausea, Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. patient reports critical episode of thrombing temporal pain. patient is a 54 yr old M. consumes more than 4 alcoholic drinks daily he denies smoking o:Height 180 cm, Weight 65.2 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15 a:Migraine Headaches p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered MRV Brain.

s:male aged 54 yrs presents with moderate photophobia, moderate phonophobia and moderate recurrent bifrontal headaches for 5 weeks. he drinks alcohol heavily for the past 5 years he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life o:Height 181 cm, Weight 65.6 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16 a:Migraine Headaches p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

tr.td: University Ears Nose and Throat Specialists

td.content: s:patient says he is having symptoms of moderate photophobia 4-5 times a week, in spite of treatment. patient is a 54 year old white M. he is a heavy drinker he denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 181 cm, Weight 65.6 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16 a:Migraine Headaches p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and ordered MRI Head.
